Author: Visual Studio Code
Description:
The Simple Browser is one of the most powerful, but most slept-on features of VS Code. In this video, engineer Justin Chen breaks down what the Simple Browser is, how to use it, and shows you some workflows you can start using today to seriously improve your web dev experience.

⌚ Chapters 00:00 — The secret built-in browser in VS Code 00:40 — How to launch & connect your local dev server 02:02 — Inspecting elements 04:45 — Using AI 07:42 — Attaching browser logs for errors 10:30 — What's coming next

#vscode #ai #browser
Title: The best VS Code feature you aren't using
